Package model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
model.Model
public class Model extends Object
The Model class represents the game model for a battleship game. It handles ship randomization, game functionality, and tracking of ship status.

  • Method Details

    • randomizeShips

      public void randomizeShips()
      Randomly positions ships for both players' boards.

    • randomizeShip

      public void randomizeShip(int boardId)
      Randomly positions ships on a specific player's board.
      Parameters:
      boardId - The ID of the player's board (1 for the first player, 2 for the second player).

    • isSuitableForShip

      public boolean isSuitableForShip(String[][] currentCoordinates, Ship ship, int randRow, int randCol)
      Checks if a given position is suitable for placing a ship of specific length on a board.
      Parameters:
      currentCoordinates - The current state of occupied coordinates on the board.
      ship - The ship to be placed.
      randRow - The row for the potential ship placement.
      randCol - The column for the potential ship placement.
      Returns:
      true if the position is suitable for ship placement, false otherwise.

    • generateShips

      public void generateShips(int boardId)
      Generates ships for the specified player's board based on the dimension.
      Parameters:
      boardId - The ID of the player's board (1 for the first player, 2 for the second player).

    • setSelectedCoordinate

      public void setSelectedCoordinate(String[][] currentCoordinates, Ship ship)
      Sets selected coordinates on the board for a given ship.
      Parameters:
      currentCoordinates - The current state of occupied coordinates on the board.
      ship - The ship for which coordinates are being set.

    • getRandomizedShips

      public Ship[] getRandomizedShips(int boardId)
      Gets an array of randomized ships for a specific player's board.
      Parameters:
      boardId - The ID of the player's board (1 for the first player, 2 for the second player).
      Returns:
      An array of Ship objects representing the randomized ships.

    • receiveShot

      public boolean receiveShot(int targetId, String coordinate)
      Receives a shot on the specified player's board and updates ship status accordingly.
      Parameters:
      targetId - The ID of the player's board receiving the shot.
      coordinate - The coordinate at which the shot is fired.
      Returns:
      true if the shot hits a ship, false otherwise.

    • updateShipCount

      public void updateShipCount(int id)
      Updates the ship count on the specified player's board after a ship is destroyed.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the player's board (1 for the first player, 2 for the second player).

    • getBoardHealth

      public int getBoardHealth(int id)
      Calculates and returns the health percentage of the specified player's board.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the player's board (1 for the first player, 2 for the second player).
      Returns:
      The health percentage of the player's board.

    • getCurrentShip

      public Ship getCurrentShip()
      Retrieves the current ship that was hit by the last shot.
      Returns:
      The Ship object representing the ship that was hit, or null if no ship was hit.

    • setDimension

      public void setDimension(int dimension)
      Sets the dimension of the game board.
      Parameters:
      dimension - The dimension of the game board.

    • getGeneratedShips

      public Ship[] getGeneratedShips(int boardId)
      Generates and returns an array of Ship objects for a specific player's board.
      Parameters:
      boardId - The ID of the player's board (1 for the first player, 2 for the second player).
      Returns:
      An array of Ship objects representing the generated ships.

    • getRecord

      public String getRecord()
      Gets the recorded game progress and hits/misses.
      Returns:
      The recorded game progress.
